input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A:
Sure thing! Here's a product description for the Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet in short, simple language:

"Wow, look at this cool helmet! It's pink and purple and has a special visor that snaps into place. It's super light and has lots of air holes to keep your head cool. Plus, it's really safe and has a special fit system to make sure it's comfy. It's perfect for your bike rides!"
input_text.Response B: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet represents the pinnacle of safety, comfort and style. The revolutionary Acu Dial fit system provides a precise, custom fit in seconds. With its In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, the Skyla is both light and durable while offering superior impact protection. The Skyla also features a snap-fit visor for enhanced aerodynamics and 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable on even the hottest days.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: I prefer B it is more factual and useful
